Sentencas: An integrated direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell is studied with an in situ catalytic steam gasification of carbon by ceria, which can significantly improve the power density of the single cell.
Titulo: Effect of Catalyst on the Performance of a Solid Oxide-Based Carbon Fuel Cell with an Internal Reforming Process

Sentencas: Using normal bubbling of the carrier nitrogen gas in temperature-controlled water bath, the carbon gasification can be realized easily and further improved by addition of the catalyst (Ce, Ca, K).
Titulo: Effect of Catalyst on the Performance of a Solid Oxide-Based Carbon Fuel Cell with an Internal Reforming Process

Sentencas: A peak power density as high as 213 mW cm(-2), which is 3/4 of that in hydrogen fuel for the same cell, could be achieved via this approach.
Titulo: Effect of Catalyst on the Performance of a Solid Oxide-Based Carbon Fuel Cell with an Internal Reforming Process

Sentencas: These results demonstrate this system highly promising for practical applications.
Titulo: Effect of Catalyst on the Performance of a Solid Oxide-Based Carbon Fuel Cell with an Internal Reforming Process
